item.title: Niger investigating $5 million sale of largest Mars rock
item.description: A 54-pound meteorite from Mars has sold for over $5 million at a New York auction, setting a world record

item.title: 3 dead in shooting at Target in Austin, suspect detained: Police
item.description: Three people are dead following a shooting at a Target store in Austin, Texas, according to police.

item.title: WATCH: One dead, 10 injured in explosion at Pennsylvania steel plant, officials say
item.description: One person has died, one is unaccounted for and 10 are injured following an explosion at a Pennsylvania steel plant on Monday, local police said.

item.title: WATCH: Derek Hough's new baby may be following in his footsteps
item.description: The "Dancing with the Stars" pro joined "GMA" to discuss becoming a dad.

item.title: WATCH: Trump puts DC police department under federal control, deploys National Guard
